title: Remove “Draft 34” version label from footer

requirements.text: Remove only the footer text that displays “Draft 34” (the live version label) while keeping the rest of the footer content and layout unchanged.
acceptanceCriteria: The footer no longer displays the text “Draft 34” anywhere.
All other footer elements remain visible and unchanged (© line, heart icon, “using”, and caffeine.ai link).
No extra separator (e.g., the “•” bullet) is shown if the version label is not rendered.

constraints: Use English for any user-facing text.
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose them instead if needed).
nonGoals: Do not remove the entire footer.
Do not change any other footer wording or styling beyond removing the “Draft 34” label.
Do not implement new versioning/publish workflows.
